name: Savanna Photo
description:
You take a photo using your mouse button and move around using mouse.

Game doesn't have a proper menu since like always I have started making it on the morning on the same day as the submission deadline was.

Animal sprites (Author:  zcool.com.cn) were taken from: http://vectorspedia.com/free-vector/cute-cartoon-animals-vector-cartoon-pack-204...

Background music: https://opengameart.org/content/waterworks
